# Williams-Warren-Zimmerman House

| locmapin             = USA Indiana Vigo County#Indiana#USA
| built                = -1854
| architect OR builder =
| architecture         = Greek Revival
| added                = October 23, 1980
| area                 = less than one acre
| refnum               = 80000046
}}
Williams-Warren-Zimmerman House, also known as the Cottage-Among-the-Lindens, is a historic home located at Terre Haute, Indiana. It was built between 1849 and 1854, and is a -story, Greek Revival style frame dwelling with a one-story wing. It sits on a stuccoed brick foundation, is sheathed in clapboard siding, and has a gable roof with dormers. The house was moved to its present location in 1874.
It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1980. It is located in the Farrington's Grove Historic District.
